name: Stabika 4: Retribution
description:
Stabika episode 4: Retribution. A continuation of Kade's story left off from 9 years ago. Taking place after the cliffhanger at the end of ep.3, episode 4 follows Kade into the latest adventure of the Stabika series!

Controls:

Arrow keys move/jump/crouch
quick attack D
strong attack S
Adrenaline attack ( touching an enemy, requires adrenaline points ) A

EMERGENCY de-glitch key--SHIFT
(This is only for if you get stuck in the floor or walls, may screw up gameplay if used for no reason )
